question: In an experiment to determine the figure of merit of a galvanometer by half deflection method, a student constructed the following circuit. He unplugged a resistance of <katex>$5200\Omega$</katex> in R. When <katex>$K_1$</katex> is closed and <katex>$K_2$</katex> is open, the deflection observed in the galvanometer is 26 div.
